title: 02/02/22 DPS Hour 3 Josh McDaniels
itunes:title: 02/02/22 DPS Hour 3 Josh McDaniels
description:
Josh McDaniels tells Dan what it was like to tell Bill Belichick that he was leaving for the Raiders. Josh says the Super Bowl with his children in attendance was the best Super Bowl of them all for him personally.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
